pages.text:
[Page Title: ABOUT | eatdrinkshellmore]

top of page Scroll OYSTERS     RESTAURANT     PATIO Our menu changes daily and typically consists of chilled oysters, 2-3 small plates, 4-5 entrees and something sweet to finish. This is, of course, accompanied by plenty of superb wines by the glass and bottle. ​ PRIVATE EVENTS - ​ The Shellmore is one of Charleston's premier indoor-outdoor event venues for rehearsal dinners and corporate wine tastings. ​ ​ Private seated dining is available for parties of up to 30 guests and stand-up events are available for parties of up to 65 guests. For event inquiry please email us at: SHELLMOREEVENTS@GMAIL.COM We hope to see you soon. CHEF ERIC MILLEY Instagram bottom of page

[Page Title: HOME | eatdrinkshellmore]

top of page Scroll "CHEF ERIC'S FOOD IS SUPERB. AND HE   COOKS THE WAY I LIKE TO EAT. IF YOU  DON'T KNOW, NOW YOU KNOW" ​ MICHAEL RUHLMAN ​ -JAMES BEARD AWARD WINNING AUTHOR OF TOO MANY BOOKS TO LIST OYSTERS   RESTAURANT  PATIO THE SHELLMORE IS AN INTIMATE NEIGHBORHOOD RESTAURANT WITH INDOOR AND OUTDOOR DINING LOCATED WITHIN I'ON VILLAGE. ​ ​ ​ ERIC MILLEY, FORMER EXECUTIVE CHEF OF JEFFERY'S GROCERY IN MANHATTAN'S WEST VILLAGE, LIVES BY THE ETHOS THAT LESS IS MORE - "LET THE INGREDIENTS SHINE, FOCUS ON CLASSIC TECHNIQUE AND GET OUT OF THE WAY". ​ ​ LEARN MORE ABOUT US & PRIVATE EVENTS DAILY MENU VIA INSTAGRAM bottom of page
